chunks.en: How long has it been since you had a raise?

chunks.zh: 前几天，工会要求，然后涨了 3.33%，去年九 9 月满一年涨了 1000 克朗，每年固定两次调薪，这个是最基本的要求。
chunks.en: A few days ago, the union requested it, and then there was a 3.33% raise. Last September, after one year of service, there was a 1000 krona raise. There are two fixed salary adjustments every year, which is the most basic requirement.

chunks.zh: 三年了，前几个月裁员，公司好多人都希望把自己裁掉，拿着赔偿找工作，环境不好也不太敢裸辞
chunks.en: It's been three years. There were layoffs a few months ago, and many people in the company hoped to be laid off, take the compensation, and find a job. The environment is not good, so they don't dare to quit without another job lined up.

chunks.zh: 入行到现在快两年，没变过，挺离谱的。想想现在这环境，还是算了没啥好说的，只能苟着。
chunks.en: It's been almost two years since I entered the industry, and it hasn't changed. It's quite outrageous. Considering the current environment, I guess I won't say anything and just endure it.

chunks.zh: 入职两年多从未涨过，但是现在这环境也只能苟着
chunks.en: I've been with the company for more than two years and never had a raise, but in this environment, I can only endure.

chunks.zh: 333 天了，预计下次涨薪在 32 天之后。
chunks.en: 333 days, and the next raise is expected in 32 days.

chunks.zh: 入职即巅峰，然后还降薪了。。。
chunks.en: The peak was when I joined, and then I even had a salary cut...
It's been two and a half years since I joined, and I haven't had a raise.
